contexts.context: ...in the high lights and less in the <mark>shadows</mark>. This grain in photogelatin is much finer...
...to the inch. Compare the flat rendering of <mark>shadows</mark> in the vaulting with the higher screening...
...note also the finer detail of light and <mark>shadow</mark> in the higher screening.
...which the plate can be retouched by The <mark>shadows</mark> can be darkened, for instance, by deepening...
